wikipedia_page.main: Kristian John Chesney (born 2 March 1974) is a rugby union footballer who started his career at Barking RUFC, played at flanker, number 8 and lock for Saracens(currently holds the record for appearances 338), RC Toulon and finished his career at Southend RUFC. At an International level he has represented and Captained the England Sevens and represented England U21 teams and represents the Barbarians on 3 tours. He also played rugby league for London Broncos.

response: Notable past students at the school include Kris Chesney, the Saracens and International Rugby player who returned to open the schools new sports hall and sixth form centre in October 2007. Chesney also returned to congratulate over 100 pupils who had won awards at the schools annual prize-giving evening in November 2007.
